paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: Two family members, one symptomatic and one asymptomatic

individual_records.phenotype_details: Symptomatic with prolonged action potential and arrhythmias.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The derived-CMs exhibited substantial prolongation of the action potential, diminished IKr, early after depolarizations (EADs), and triggered arrhythmias.
Although the action potential duration was increased in the iPSC-CMs derived from both the clinically symptomatic patient and the clinically asymptomatic mother.

functional_data.summary: iPSC-CMs derived from the patient with KCNH2-A561V mutation exhibited prolonged action potential and reduced IKr.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The penetrance data indicates variability in clinical presentation among carriers.
key_quotes: The derived-CMs exhibited substantial prolongation of the action potential, diminished IKr, early after depolarizations (EADs), and triggered arrhythmias.
Although the action potential duration was increased in the iPSC-CMs derived from both the clinically symptomatic patient and the clinically asymptomatic mother.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the KCNH2 gene was extracted successfully.
